name: Scroll Up CL7
author: coderlucky7

sections.description:
Scroll up CL7. This plugin will add scroll to top feature in your wordpress site. is very easy to use, just install and activate plugin, it will work automatically.
Its very easy to use and it also working on WordPress Dashboard.

want to see how it work ? Click here: https://coderlucky7com.000webhostapp.com/plugins
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload plugin-directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Just install and active it will work automaticall.
  4. this plugin work web pages and dshboard also. if you don’t want to use in WordPress Dashboard, just let me know, I’ll solve it.
